pageProps.aboutHtml:
I received my Ph.D. in random matrix theory from UCLA Department of Mathematics in 2025 under my advisor Jun Yin. I was also an undergraduate at UCLA, where I obtained both my B.S. in Mathematics of Computation and my M.A. in Mathematics through the Departmental Scholars Program.

Office Hours

  • Tuesdays, 1pm - 3pm (MATH 275A)
